description: color cover with black octagonal sign at C with "YIELD" in yellow lettering; red octagonal sign at L with "DO IT NOW" in black; blue sign at R that reads "OBEY THE SIGNS" and smaller sign at bottom that says, "HESITATE"; yellow and red blocks at top with artist name and title; contains simplistic black and white drawings of nude figures, abstract, and repeating themes with text; lender's archive #15
image_copyright: © David Shrigley %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F DACS%2C UK
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed in pencil on first page: DAVID SHRIGLEY
title: Do Not Bend
